item.description:
Night out at Foxwoods, aka our mini Vegas here in Connecticut: RSVP and give me a call if you need more information. We'll be meeting up at Hard Rock Cafe for food and drinks around 08:00 p.m. http://www.hardrock.com/locations/cafes3/cafe.aspx?LocationID=375&MIBEnumID=3

We'll mingle and socialize - for new members it will be a nice opportunity to meet and get to know everyone in the group. Give me a call/text 860-294-2113 or Jen at ‎860-214-2243 when you arrive and we'll greet and introduce you in to the group. We'll stay at Hard Rock for a bit then make our way to MGM Shrine Night Club sometime before 10 so ladies can get in for free: http://www.shrinemgmfoxwoods.com/

Ladies $20, but no cover before 10p.m. /Gents $20 after 9 PM.  Dress code is trendy upscale ( http://www.shrinemgmfoxwoods.com/dresscode.pdf). RSVP and feel free to give me a call should you have any questions.

Later!

Kim and Jen
item.name: HARD ROCK CAFE and SHRINE @ FOXWOODS CASINO
